name: FileMaker Tool
semantic_context: Retrieve data from the FileMaker data API
natural_language_description: 这是 FileMaker Tool 节点。主要用于: Retrieve data from the FileMaker data API

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Retrieve data from the FileMaker data API
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Retrieve data from the FileMaker data API | (必填项)

action.name: action
action.natural_language_description: 参数名: Action | 默认值: record

layout.name: layout
layout.description: FileMaker Layout Name. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
layout.natural_language_description: 参数名: Layout Name or ID | 作用: FileMaker Layout Name. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

recid.name: recid
recid.description: Internal Record ID returned by get (recordid)
recid.natural_language_description: 参数名: Record ID | 作用: Internal Record ID returned by get (recordid) | (必填项)

offset.name: offset
offset.description: The record number of the first record in the range of records
offset.natural_language_description: 参数名: Offset | 作用: The record number of the first record in the range of records | 默认值: 1

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

getPortals.name: getPortals
getPortals.description: Whether to get portal data as well
getPortals.natural_language_description: 参数名: Get Portals | 作用: Whether to get portal data as well | 默认值: False

portals.name: portals
portals.description: The portal result set to return. Use the portal object name or portal table name. If this parameter is omitted, the API will return all portal objects and records in the layout. For best performance, pass the portal object name or portal table name. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
portals.natural_language_description: 参数名: Portals Name or ID | 作用: The portal result set to return. Use the portal object name or portal table name. If this parameter is omitted, the API will return all portal objects and records in the layout. For best performance, pass the portal object name or portal table name. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: []

responseLayout.name: responseLayout
responseLayout.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
responseLayout.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Layout Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

queries.name: queries
queries.natural_language_description: 参数名: Queries | 默认值: {}

setSort.name: setSort
setSort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort Data? | 作用: Whether to sort data | 默认值: False

sortParametersUi.name: sortParametersUi
sortParametersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort | 作用: Sort rules | 默认值: {}

setScriptBefore.name: setScriptBefore
setScriptBefore.description: Whether to define a script to be run before the action specified by the API call and after the subsequent sort
setScriptBefore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Before Find Script | 作用: Whether to define a script to be run before the action specified by the API call and after the subsequent sort | 默认值: False

scriptBefore.name: scriptBefore
scriptBefore.description: The name of the FileMaker script to be run after the action specified by the API call and after the subsequent sort. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
scriptBefore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Script Name or ID | 作用: The name of the FileMaker script to be run after the action specified by the API call and after the subsequent sort. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

scriptBeforeParam.name: scriptBeforeParam
scriptBeforeParam.description: A parameter for the FileMaker script
scriptBeforeParam.natural_language_description: 参数名: Script Parameter | 作用: A parameter for the FileMaker script

setScriptSort.name: setScriptSort
setScriptSort.description: Whether to define a script to be run after the action specified by the API call but before the subsequent sort
setScriptSort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Before Sort Script | 作用: Whether to define a script to be run after the action specified by the API call but before the subsequent sort | 默认值: False

scriptSort.name: scriptSort
scriptSort.description: The name of the FileMaker script to be run after the action specified by the API call but before the subsequent sort. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
scriptSort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Script Name or ID | 作用: The name of the FileMaker script to be run after the action specified by the API call but before the subsequent sort. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

scriptSortParam.name: scriptSortParam
scriptSortParam.description: A parameter for the FileMaker script
scriptSortParam.natural_language_description: 参数名: Script Parameter | 作用: A parameter for the FileMaker script

setScriptAfter.name: setScriptAfter
setScriptAfter.description: Whether to define a script to be run after the action specified by the API call but before the subsequent sort
setScriptAfter.natural_language_description: 参数名: After Sort Script | 作用: Whether to define a script to be run after the action specified by the API call but before the subsequent sort | 默认值: False

scriptAfter.name: scriptAfter
scriptAfter.description: The name of the FileMaker script to be run after the action specified by the API call and after the subsequent sort. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
scriptAfter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Script Name or ID | 作用: The name of the FileMaker script to be run after the action specified by the API call and after the subsequent sort. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

scriptAfterParam.name: scriptAfterParam
scriptAfterParam.description: A parameter for the FileMaker script
scriptAfterParam.natural_language_description: 参数名: Script Parameter | 作用: A parameter for the FileMaker script

modId.name: modId
modId.description: The last modification ID. When you use modId, a record is edited only when the modId matches.
modId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mod ID | 作用: The last modification ID. When you use modId, a record is edited only when the modId matches.

fieldsParametersUi.name: fieldsParametersUi
fieldsParametersUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: Fields to define | 默认值: {}

script.name: script
script.description: The name of the FileMaker script to be run. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
script.natural_language_description: 参数名: Script Name or ID | 作用: The name of the FileMaker script to be run. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

scriptParam.name: scriptParam
scriptParam.description: A parameter for the FileMaker script
scriptParam.natural_language_description: 参数名: Script Parameter | 作用: A parameter for the FileMaker script
